name: Ownership
description: majority land ownership within the dgo

name: State
description: majority state that the dgo intersects

name: County
description: majority county that the dgo intersects

name: Primary Channel Gradient
description: gradient calculated along the main flowline
method: (𝑡𝑜𝑝 𝑜𝑓 𝑟𝑒𝑎𝑐ℎ 𝑒𝑙𝑒𝑣𝑎𝑡𝑖𝑜𝑛 −𝑏𝑜𝑡𝑡𝑜𝑚 𝑜𝑓 𝑟𝑒𝑎𝑐ℎ 𝑒𝑙𝑒𝑣𝑎𝑡𝑖𝑜𝑛)/(𝑛𝑒𝑡𝑤𝑜𝑟𝑘 𝑙𝑒𝑛𝑔𝑡ℎ)
docs_url: Hack, J. T. (1973). Stream-profile analysis and stream-gradient index. Journal of Research of the U.S. Geological Survey, 1(4), 421–429. Nagel, D., Buffington, J., & Isaak, D. (4006). Comparison of methods for estimating stream channel gradient using GIS. USDA Forest Service, Rocky Mountain Research Station Boise Aquatic Sciences Lab.

name: Valley Gradient
description: gradient calculated along the valley centerline
method: (𝑡𝑜𝑝 𝑜𝑓 𝑠𝑒𝑔𝑚𝑒𝑛𝑡 𝑒𝑙𝑒𝑣. −𝑏𝑜𝑡𝑡𝑜𝑚 𝑜𝑓 𝑠𝑒𝑔𝑚𝑒𝑛𝑡 𝑒𝑙𝑒𝑣.)/(𝑣𝑎𝑙𝑙𝑒𝑦 𝑏𝑜𝑡𝑡𝑜𝑚 𝑐𝑒𝑛𝑡𝑒𝑟𝑙𝑖𝑛𝑒)

name: Relative Flow Length
description: ratio of channel length to centerline length
method: sum of all blue line lenth/valley length

name: Confluence Count
description: number of locations where anabranches converge

name: Diffluence Count
description: number of locations where anabranches split

name: Tributary Junction Count
description: number of tributary junctions within the analysis window

name: Planform Sinuosity of Main Stream
description: ratio of channel lenght to straight line distance between end points

name: Drainage Area
description: upstream contributing drainage area

name: Watershed ID
description: NHD 10-digit Hydrologic Unit Code ID

name: Stream Name
description: stream name of the main flowline in the dgo

name: Stream Order
description: standard strahler order attribute from NHD

name: Headwater
description: is greater than 50% of the analysis window marked as is_headwater?

name: Stream Type
description: NHD F Code Attribute

name: Stream Length
description: length of the stream in the analysis window

name: Waterbody Type
description: NHD Waterbody Type Attribute

name: Waterbody Extent
description: area of waterbody

name: Ecoregion III
description: majority level 3 ecoregion within the dgo

name: Ecoregion IV
description: majority level 4 ecoregion within the dgo

name: Landfire EVT Classes
description: landfire existing vegetation type classes within the dgo that make up >= 30% of dgo

name: Landfire BpS Classes
description: landfire biophysical settings classes within the dgo that make up >= 30% of dgo

name: Lanfire Agriculture Cover
description: landfire agriculture cover within the dgo

name: Landfire Conifer Cover
description: landfire forest cover within the dgo

name: Landfire Conifer/Hardwood
description: landfire conifer/hardwood cover within the dgo

name: Landfire Developed
description: landfire developed cover within the dgo

name: Landfire Exotic Herbaceous
description: landfire exotic herbaceous cover within the dgo

name: Landfire Exotic Tree-Shrub
description: landfire exotic tree/shrub cover within the dgo

name: Landfire Grassland
description: landfire grassland cover within the dgo

name: Landfire Hardwood
description: landfire hardwood cover within the dgo

name: Landfire Riparian
description: landfire riparian cover within the dgo

name: Landfire Shrubland
description: landfire shrubland cover within the dgo

name: Landfire Sparsely Vegetated
description: landfire sparsely vegetated cover within the dgo

name: BPS Conifer
description: landfire conifer cover within the dgo

name: BPS Conifer-Hardwood
description: landfire conifer/hardwood cover within the dgo

name: BPS Grassland
description: landfire grassland cover within the dgo

name: BPS Hardwood
description: landfire hardwood cover within the dgo

name: BPS Hardwood-Conifer
description: landfire hardwood/conifer cover within the dgo

name: BPS Peatland Forest
description: landfire peatland forest cover within the dgo

name: BPS Peatland Non-forest
description: landfire peatland non-forest cover within the dgo

name: BPS Riparian
description: landfire riparian cover within the dgo

name: BPS Savanna
description: landfire savanna cover within the dgo

name: BPS Shrubland
description: landfire shrubland cover within the dgo

name: BPS Sparsely Vegetated
description: landfire sparsely vegetated cover within the dgo

name: Low-Lying Valley Bottom
description: area of vbet low-lying floodplain

name: Elevated Valley Bottom
description: area of vbet elevated floodplain

name: Active Channel Area
description: area of vbet channel area

name: Floodplain Area
description: area of vbet floodplain

name: Integrated Width
description: average width of dgo

name: Active Channel Ratio
description: ratio of active channel to total valley bottom area

name: Low-Lying Ratio
description: ratio of low-lying to total valley bottom area

name: Elevated Ratio
description: ratio of elevated to total valley bottom area

name: Floodplain Ratio
description: ratio of floodplain to total valley bottom area

name: Acres Valley Bottom Per Mile
description: acres of valley bottom per mile of valley length

name: Hectares Valley Bottom Per KM
description: hectares of valley bottom per km of valley length

name: Stream Size Metric
description: average channel width

name: Confinement
description: confinement ratio within analysis window

name: Constriction
description: constriction ratio within analysis window

name: Length of confining Margins
description: length of confining margins within the analysis window

name: Low Flow Stream Power
description: typical baseflow stream power

name: High Flow Stream Power
description: typical flood flow stream power

name: Road Density
description: ratio of road length to valley centerline length

name: Rail Density
description: ratio of railroad length to valley centerline length

name: Land Use Intensity
description: land use intensity (0-100) within the analysis window

name: Distance to Roads
description: distance to nearest road

name: Distance to Railroads
description: distance to nearest railroad

name: Distance to Diversion Point
description: distance to nearest diversion point

name: Distance to Canal/Ditch
description: distance to nearest canal/ditch

name: Distance to Infrastructure
description: distance to nearest infrastructure

name: Floodplain Accessibility
description: proportion of floodplain accessible to channel

name: Accessible Floodplain Extent
description: accessible floodplain extent within the analysis window

name: Existing Riparian Extent
description: existing riparian extent within the analysis window

name: Historic Riparian Extent
description: historic riparian extent within the analysis window

name: Proportion Riparian
description: proportion of the analysis window that is riparian vegetation

name: Historic Proportion Riparian
description: historic proportion of the analysis window that is riparian vegetation

name: Riparian Vegetation Departure
description: riparian vegetation departure within the analysis window

name: Agriculture Conversion
description: proportion of riparian vegetation converted to agriculture

name: Development
description: proportion of riparian vegetation converted to developed

name: Grass/Shrubland conversion
description: proportion of riparian vegetation converted to grass/shrubland

name: Conifer Encroachment
description: proportion of riparian vegetation converted to conifer

name: Invasive Conversion
description: proportion of riparian vegetation converted to invasive species

name: Riparian Condition
description: riparian condition index score (0-1)

name: Beaver Dam Capacity
description: beaver dam capacity (dams/km of valley length)

name: Historic Beaver Dam Capacity
description: historic beaver dam capacity (dams/km of valley length)

name: BRAT Risk
description: risk of dam building activity to infrastructure

name: BRAT Opportunity
description: restoration/conservation opportunities

name: BRAT Limitation
description: limitation to beaver dam building activity

name: Existing Dam Complex Size
description: average size of beaver dam complexes

name: Historic Dam Complex Size
description: historic average size of beaver dam complexes
